title: How does learning take place in primary socialisation? - Quora

response.answer_text: When people get together they learned from their mistakes on what to do and what not to do or say. Youngsters only learn from their mistakes on what is good consequences and bad consequences from socialization. Just why when people socialize they know how to fake it so that they will not be ostracized. Because they know the rules of socializing. When people don’t know how to get along with others they will not be welcome to that society or groups.
